distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for perl fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:
- CVE-2017-6512: Race condition in the rmtree and remove_tree functions in the
  File-Path module before 2.13 for Perl allows attackers to set the mode on
  arbitrary files via vectors involving directory-permission loosening logic.
  (bnc#1047178)

Bug fixes:
- reformat baselibs.conf as source validator workaround
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Race condition in the rmtree and remove_tree functions in the File-Path module before 2.13 for Perl allows attackers to set the mode on arbitrary files via vectors involving directory-permission loosening logic.
